overview: "Fat" is a song by "Weird Al" Yankovic. It is a parody of "Bad" by Michael Jackson. It is Yankovic's second parody of a Jackson song, the first being "Eat It", a parody of Jackson's "Beat It". "Fat" is the first song on Yankovic's Even Worse album.  The video won a Grammy Award for Best Concept Music Video in 1988.
title: 'Weird Al' Yankovic: Fat
